data.message: I'd love a coke zero vanilla if you guys are listening ;-)

replies.message: Hey Craig, unfortunately we don't hold stock of any products that we're able to send you. Thanks :)
Coca-Cola Ah! I didn't mean to send me. I just haven't seen Coca Cola Zero Vanilla as a product on the shop shelves and would love to see it :-)

Hi Craig, apologies for any confusion caused. It's at the retailer's discretion which products they choose to stock on their shelves. If you're struggling to find Coca-Cola Zero Sugar Vanilla, we'd recommend speaking to the Grocery Manager in your local stores. Thanks                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                        "
Craig James Duffy It exists, we got some from our local morrisons a week or so ago
Benjamin Smith I had no idea! I shall be searching for it from now on. Thank you!
Yep, only seen in Morrisons cans are multipack or large bottle
This is great news, gotta head to Morrisons this weekend!
Here you go bro  Coca-Cola Zero Sugar Vanilla Drink, 8 x 330 ml https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B06XX6LNKT/ref=cm_sw_r_cp_tai_a2qEzbVQJW859
Tesco are stocking the vanilla one
Yeah got it in Tesco( in Kent )this week - had high hopes but turns out it's kinda minging.
Craig James Duffy  I'm not sure where you are but iv seen it in pound land of all places but you have to be fast as it's goes quickly
